item.title: Mentioned by Calgary Herald
item.description:
Environmental spending 'disappointing'
The budget's minimal environmental provisions could severely affect Alberta if they impact bitumen exports and U.S. approval of the Keystone XL pipeline, said Edmonton NDP MP Linda Duncan. “Instead of both of the federal and provincial government ... But Liberal environment critic Kirsty Duncan said the budget's environmental provisions amount to nothing but “tokenism” and show that the Conservative government has no over-arching plan or goal for the environment. The budget also missed an opportunity for ...
